duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan, organize, direct, and control district operating and sales functions.
Manage profit and loss, budgeting, staffing, and development of the business.
Responsible for sales objectives including sales volume, market penetration, profitability, and selling cost.
Optimize profitable market share growth and financial performance including revenue and OPR performance.
Motivate, develop, and retain operations and sales workforce.
Foster a customer-focused approach to sales and service.
Make personal sales calls on major accounts or prospect customers.
Implement Region sales strategies to achieve revenue goals.
Establish high safety standards for audits, training, and compliance with legal requirements.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor of Science in Engineering, Business, Marketing, or related technical field preferred. Microsoft Office and personal computing proficiency preferred.
